Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the fabric is partly grey in section, the interior is spotted with a yellow-brown deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394760) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394760)
